results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(n) = A254104(A249746(1+n)-1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = (A254115((2*n)+1)-1) / 2. [Obtained also from the odd bisection of A254115.]
program: return 1 if n==1 else (1 + reduce(mul, [nextprime(i)**f[i] for i in f]))/2
xref: Other related permutations: A249746, A254104, A254115.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 05 2015
